description:
The Individual Software Practicum is designed to allow students to experience entrepreneurial enterprises, such as high technology start-up companies, and contribute to those companies by playing a significant role in the
development of an advanced software product.

The practicum allows students to apply their knowledge in a real world context, demonstrating their mastery of a range of Software skills, such as in project management, requirements analysis, architecture and design, software construction, verification and validation.
title: Individual Software Practicum
